Forebet - Mathematical football predictions, stats and scores, covering most football leagues from all around the world. The Forebet key features include:

PREDICTIONS - A system for predicting football matches on the basis of statistics using complex mathematical algorithms. Probabilities are calculated for the final outcome of the match (1x2 predictions), Under/Over 2.5 goals to be scored in the match, Both teams to score, Half Time outcome, Half Time and Full time combined, Correct score. The forebet machine learning algorithms work on a huge database storing football data generated since year 2000. The results are then displayed in the app in a comprehensible manner.

STATISTICS - User friendly displayed statistical data for each match such as league standings, team form, last played matches results, head to head statistics between the match opponents, overall accumulated stats such as average scored or conceded goals, next matches opponents difficulty level calculated by an algorithm, which analyses the teams past performance.

LIVE SCORES - updating the matches scores while they are in-play with their interesting events by minute such as goalscorers, assist players, yellow or red cards, substitutions.

TRENDS - Standout statistical trends outlined and formed in a human readable text. 

PREVIEWS - Unique match previews for some of the most interesting upcoming matches, created by our experienced editorial team.

FAVOURITES - Follow the matches that matter to you simply by tapping on the star button next to each prediction row or just follow an entire league by selecting it from the leagues menu as a favourite again by the star button.

ABOUT FOREBET
Forebet has been delivering its mathematical football predictions since 2009 when the first statistical model was created an uploaded online. Since then our team always worked passionately to improve and develop the system. 
Forebet is and has always been free, delivering unique content to the football fans!

El reto de correr nace con el objetivo de que todas las personas que quieren iniciarse o que practican “Running” o Atletismo de una manera no guiada tengan a su disposición los medios humanos y los conocimientos para poderlo hacer de forma segura y eficaz. 

El reto de correr estudia tus objetivos o retos, tus características personales y disponibilidad, elabora un entrenamiento personalizado y adaptado y, lo más importante, realiza un seguimiento continuo. 

La plataforma online te va a permitir, estar en contacto permanente con el entrenador y reportarle un feedback de tus entrenamientos, si lo consideras necesario. 

Es relativamente fácil acceder a entrenamientos genéricos para diferentes distancias y objetivos. Sin embargo, éstos ignoran las capacidades y diferencias individuales de cada persona. Esta falta de adaptación y personalización puede hacer que, por mucho que le dediques no consigas tus objetivos. O lo que es mucho peor, te ponen en una situación de riesgo de lesión o en situaciones de riesgo para la salud. 

El contacto permanente entre runner y entrenador va a permitir que el entrenamiento “sea algo vivo”. 

Los entrenamientos personalizados están orientados a carreras de 10k, ½ Maratón y Maratón. Además, en el Reto de Correr podemos ayudarte con la preparación de cualquier otra disciplina o distancia que quieras afrontar. 

Del mismo modo, si eres un runner o atleta con experiencia que entrenas con regularidad, te ofrecemos la posibilidad de planificar tu temporada de forma continua y con distintos objetivos a lo largo de la misma.

BJJ Logbook is the best and most entertaining way to record your BJJ journey! 

Simply download the app, start logging, and enjoy the benefits: 

1.	Retain more details from training
2.	Improve faster
3.	Never forget an important date
4.	Track your statistics

We know we should keep a journal of our Jiu Jitsu training, but it's inconvenient to drag a paper notebook to the academy. Who has room for a paper notebook in their bag?

Unlike a paper notebook, BJJ Logbook is always with you because your phone is always with you. This app makes keeping a BJJ journal easy.

HOW IT WORKS

After training (or a competition, or a promotion), open the app. Hit the “add a log entry” button and go through the streamlined process of adding an entry. Most of the important details are pre-filled for speed. You can make entries for gi training, nogi training, open mat, etc. Most things can be added by clicking and scrolling, but there are several fields that capture text input. So, write as much or as little as you want.

COOL BJJ LOGBOOK FEATURES

* “Home” tab displays your training totals for the week, month, and year. You can also start a log entry right from the Home tab.

* “Stats” tab has three pages. Page one has stats for your entire BJJ career. Page two tracks your competition record – your whole competition record is summarized here. Finally, page three shows your belt progress. At a glance, you can see how long you spent at every belt and how long you’ve been at your current belt!

* “Logbook” tab contains all your log entries – training, competitions, and promotions. From here, you can view, edit, add, or delete log entries. 

* Cloud Storage - your log entries are stored in the cloud. If you lose your phone, you won't lose your logbook. Simply log into BJJ Logbook on another iOS device and get instant access to your logbook. This also means you can use BJJ Logbook with multiple devices. Make an entry on your iPhone and review it later on your iPad. BJJ Logbook gives you great flexibility to log entries with all your compatible iOS devices.

You spend a lot of time and effort training Jiu Jitsu. Make sure you take a small amount of time to capture all the important details. Your mind may forget, but BJJ Logbook will not.

If you need more information, go to https://bjjlogbook.com

We hope you love using our app! If you do, please consider leaving a review.

If you have any suggestions or feedback for our team, please contact us at https://bjjlogbook.com/contact-us
